text: This game is really close to Mario Kart perfection. Apart from better graphics when they release #9 on the next console, I have hard time seeing how they can make it much better. It's a bit like with Smash Bros really. Both DLC packs were also great, I love how the Animal Crosing track has 4 seasons.
author: SupraDarky

text: SupraDarky I hope we get at least one more dlc pack for Mario Kart 8.
author: Neon Majora

text: @Neon Majora I hope too, but I unfortunately wouldn't count on it happening.
author: SupraDarky

text: @SupraDarky Yeah.
author: Neon Majora

text: Is that silly bunnyhop still the fastest way to drive like it was in the Wii U version? That and the horn item are what made me drop the game, took away both the craziness and smooth driving I loved from the franchise :(
author: JFK piano

text: @JFK piano Turbo hopping is no longer useful in the switch version. Not sure what your issue is with the horn item... but you can hold two items now, so item gameplay is a bit more crazy.
author: King Blank

text: They will add Funky Kong.
author: David Raygoza

text: Deluxe was really disspointing with the content it lacked, it really needed more to justify the full price tag, but it's Mario Kart so watcha gonna do, people will buy it anyways. If anything, at least this track makes me more excited for the new Animal Crossing.
author: Duskool

text: @King Blank Good to hear. What I didnt like about the horn is that it was way too good as a defensive item, you're supposed to be punished for being in first in MK :P
author: JFK piano

text: @JFK piano balance is important. Mario kart historically is genuinely mean to places 1-3, and the horn exists so that, while you still have a harder time in first place, you aren't getting punished by random, unavoidable items simply for being good at the goddamn game
author: Harrison Lane

text: @Harrison Lane That's the thing though, I see MK when racing against players (with items) as a party game. A good party game does not necessarily need to be fairly balanced, MK being one of the prime examples of it as they are known for giving chances to those behind to make a comeback. The horn made it too easy to dominate the game, leaving out those beginners.
author: JFK piano

text: @JFK piano That's why I like the lighning bolt (everyone except those way in the back get targeted,) and the bullit bill/golden mushroom. These let others catch up, while not punishing people who are in first place!
author: garfreeek

text: Have any of you tried to play Mario Kart with the bgm muted? The soundtrack is the soul of the game
